displayName.text: Concierge Pain Relief - Home Physical Therapy

adrFormatAddress: 1120 5th Ave # 11b, New York, NY 10128, USA

originalText.text: Mo was an amazing PT. He took the time to develop a thorough treatment plan that was suitable for my goals and then progressed through the plan nicely. He was always on time, and the utmost professional. I would recommend him highly to anyone in need who wants to get to a place that is better than before surgery.

He was always on time, and the utmost professional. I would recommend him highly to anyone in need who wants to get to a place that is better than before surgery.

originalText.text: They helped me break up a blocked nerve and my shoulder. Since then I've been able to sleep without pain and restored function in my left side. Give me a few exercises and I'm as good as new

originalText.text:
I recently had the pleasure of being recommended to Dr. David Kittle as physiotherapist who helped me with a back pain that was persistent for over a week.

From the initial consultation, he took the time to listen to my concerns and understand the root cause of my back pain. He then developed a personalized treatment plan that included a variety of exercises and techniques to alleviate my pain and improve my mobility.

Throughout the treatment process, he was incredibly patient and supportive, providing clear instructions on how to perform each exercise and made sure that I was comfortable with each step before moving on to the next. Also checked in regularly to see how I was feeling and adjust the treatment plan as needed.

Thanks to Dr. David Kittle's expertise and guidance, I'm happy to say that my back pain has significantly improved and after one week of the treatment and following the exercises at home I’m back to feel 100% better. I would highly recommend his services to anyone seeking a skilled and compassionate physiotherapist.

originalText.text:
I just have to say how grateful I am to have been introduced to Concierge Pain Relief.
This is exactly the personal, attentive care that my mom needed. It's so hard to find a doctor anymore that's willing to really spend the time and listen. My mom had a difficult time expressing some of her challenges and Dr Kittle was beyond helpful in understanding the underlying issues and anticipated her needs and addressed all our concerns. Life is too short for mediocre health care. My mom's physical issues have improved drastically so far and that is truly priceless.

originalText.text:
I have been suffering from what has become chronic knee pain after running.
Having seen numerous knee specialists, doctors and physical therapists I had given up hope. That was until Dr. Dave Kittle’s Concierge Pain Relief.

Dave’s rigorous assessment and healing hands had an instant impact. Not just pain relief but instant improvement to my range of movement, but he provided a clear and concise explanation of what was causing me to experience the knee pain and provided a treatment plan.
I now have hope and belief that I will be able to put a year of pain in the past and be back running pain free.
